artist: Painter: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn; Engraver: Louis Claude Le Grand
description: Bathsheba at her Toilet; young woman, mostly nude, seated on a rock near a pool at center; turned slightly right and looking at viewer; older woman at right tending to her feet; black woman behind combing hair; peacock at lower left; city right background; King David watching from roof far right
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

above image in black: 84 | below image in black: Rembrandt Pinx   Le Grand Sc. /  Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain  | on sheet in pencil: 2-275
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plate 84
title: Print
